@@ Malik saheb , 

Thanks for your reply,  Current Youtube par bahut kharab print ki hai , haalaki main dekh chuka hoon,  To phir ek ghar hi kar dijiye ga upload, intazar rahega , 

ek baat aur hai , NDT abhi maine dekhi nahin hai AB ki upload ki hui.. aur na hi dekhna chaonga jab tak aap upload nahin karte , Umeed hai aap se ki aap Iss diwali par kuch art filme apne aaladini chirag ko ghiss kar nikaalnege.

Ta umar aapka 
G.M
